item.title: Aimee add a quote by Mother Theresa of Calcutta
item.description: "Each one of them is Jesus in disguise." -- Mother Theresa of Calcutta

item.title: Aimee add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Always be comic in a tragedy. What the deuce else can you do?" -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "We must rapidly begin the shift from a "thing-oriented" society to a "person-oriented" society. When machines and computers, profit motives and property rights are considered more important than people, the giant triplets of racism, materialism, and militarism are incapable of being conquered." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Aimee add a quote by mahatma gandhi
item.description: "I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet." -- mahatma gandhi

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Wendell Berry
item.description: "Better than any argument is to rise at dawn and pick dew-wet red berries in a cup." -- Wendell Berry

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born." -- Anais Nin
